General.Name: Ramsay Health Care Limited
General.Description: Ramsay Health Care Limited owns and operates hospitals. The company offers health care services to public and private patients. It operates facilities in approximately 530 locations in the Asia Pacific, the United Kingdom, France, and Nordics. Ramsay Health Care Limited was founded in 1964 and is based in Sydney, Australia.

7.Name: Sir Edward  Byrne AC, DSc, FMEDSCI, FRACP, FRCP, FTSE, M.D., MBA
7.Title: Group Chief Medical Officer

8.Name: Mr. Kah Peng Hong
8.Title: Group Chief Exec. Officer of Ramsay Sime Darby Health Care
